BFUHS Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 406 Staff Nurse Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 08, 2025, 17:10 IST
 Baba Farid University of Health Science
 406 Jobs |  Posted On : 08-Aug-2025 |  Punjab |  Salary : 29,200 to 29,200




FOLLOW

The Baba Farid University of Health Sciences (BFUHS) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 406 Staff Nurse Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass, B.Sc Nursing, or GNM can apply for the BFUHS Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the last date of application. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Punjab.

BFUHS Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Staff Nurse	406	10th pass, GNM, B.Sc Nursing.

BFUHS Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 18 Years.
The maximum age limit: 37 Years.

Age Relaxation:

For SC/ST/BC candidates: 05 Years.
For PH candidates: 10 Years.

BFUHS Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on

Written Exam.
Experience.

BFUHS Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For all other candidates: Rs. 2,360/-.
For SC candidates: Rs. 1,180/-.

BFUHS Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The basic pay: Rs. 29,200/- per month.
How to Apply for the BFUHS Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the BFUHS Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	07-08-2025
Closing date	27-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
